title: Glider Pilot Tools

## Links

[Slocum Fleet Mission Control](https://sfmc.webbresearch.com/sfmc/login) - SFMC from Teledyne. Where to pilot the gliders using Iridium.

[Argos](https://argos-system.clsamerica.com/argos-cwi2/login.html) - Check where the gliders are if they miss a call in.

[Datahost](https://datahost.webbresearch.com/) - The TWR forum. It has the firmware builds for the gliders, Masterdata for the different firmware, TWR glider sheets, such as, Ballast, Functional Checkout, etc. Most forms are in Resources.

[Masterdata](https://gliderfs2.coas.oregonstate.edu/gliderweb/masterdata/) - A list of masterdata for all the various operating systems of Slocum gliders. 

[Masterdata 8.6](masterdata/masterdata_8_6.txt)  [Masterdata 11.0](masterdata/masterdata_11_0.txt) [Masterdata 11.01](masterdata/masterdata_11_01.txt)

[Teledyne Customer Portal](https://tmv-taptone.my.site.com/slocum/s/) - Where to check the status of service on gliders and glider parts at TWR.

[OceanGNS](https://www.oceangns.com/login) - A program that can track multiple gliders as well as has different layers. The layers can be depth average currents, sea ice, chlorophyll, etc.
